div1.p: Brewer thanks Moran for the photograph and other information.

div1.head: Letter from Melvin D. Brewer to John J. Moran, October 9, 1940

opener.dateline:
THE ALUMNI ASSOCIATION
OFFICE OF THE SECRETARY
WASHINGTON AND JEFFERSON COLLEGE
WASHINGTON, PENNSYLVANIA
October 9, 1940

div1.p:
Thank you very much for your quick
response to my telegram of last Saturday. Your
picture arrived in good time and we were very
glad to have it for our publicity. I will try
to save you copies of all publicity in which it
appears so that you will have a complete record
of your visit to the College.

I am deeply indebted to you for forward-
ing the pages from the Army Register. They give
us the exact information that we have been looking
for during the past few weeks. I will return the
pages to you just as soon as we have copied the
necessary information from them.

We are all looking forward to meeting
you here on October 26. It will be a great day
for the College and for you. We hope that your
visit will be a very pleasant one.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, M. D. Brewer
Alumni Secretary Mr. John J. Moran

Avenida Menocal Nos. 455-457
HAVANA, Cuba
